src_text: ၼမ်ႉၵတ်ႉတၢင်ႇဢၼ် ၸိူဝ်းဢၼ်လႆႈထုၵ်ႇလိူၵ်ႈတၢင်ႇမႃးၼၼ်ႉ တေမီး ၽၢႆႇၶႅပ်းႁၢင်ႈဢၼ်ၶႅမ်ႉသုတ်း (Best Picture)၊ ၽၢႆႇၽူႈၸတ်းၵၢၼ်ၸိူင်း (Director)၊ ၽၢႆႇၼမ်ႉၵတ်ႉပၢႆးမွၼ်းၵၢၼ်ပေႃႉၸိူင်း (Cinematography)၊ ၽၢႆႇႁၢင်ႈၶိူင်ႈ (Costume Design)၊ ၽၢႆတတ်းတေႃႇၸိူင်း (Film-editing)၊ ၽၢႆႇၽဵင်းၵႂၢမ်းဢၼ်ၸႂ်ႉၸွမ်းၸိူင်း (Original Score)၊ ၽၢႆႇၶပ်းၶိုင်ႁဵတ်းဢွၵ်ႇၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈၶွင်ၸိူင်း (Production Design)၊ ၽၢႆႇတတ်းတေႃႇသဵင် (Sound Editing)၊ ၽၢႆႇၶပ်းၶိုင်သဵင် (Sound Mixing) လႄႈ ၽၢႆႇၶေႃႈၵႂၢမ်းဢၼ်ၸႂ်ႉၼႂ်းငဝ်းတူင်ႉမိူဝ်ႈပၢၼ်ၵွၼ်ႇ (Original Screenplay)။
ref_text: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src_text: ၸဝ်ႈေႁႃၶမ်း King Louis XVI၊ ၼၢင်းေႁႃၶမ်း Queen Marie Antoinette၊ တင်းလုၵ်ႈဢွၼ်ႇလဵၵ်ႉၶွင်ၶဝ်သွင်ေၵႃႉ (Marie Therese ဢႃႇယု11 ၶူပ်ႇ ႄလႈ Louis-Charles ဢႃႇယုသီႇၶူပ်ႇ)၊ ႄလႈ Madam Elizabeth ပီႈၼၢင်းၸဝ်ႈေႁႃၶမ်း ၸိူဝ်းၶဝ်ၼႆႉပဵၼ်ဢၼ်တူၵ်းၸႂ်ၵူဝ်ႁႄသေ လႆႈထုၵ်ႇ ၸုမ်းၼၢင်းယိင်းၸိူဝ်းၶၢႆၶွင်ၼႂ်းၵၢတ်ႇႁေႃႈလိုပ်ႈဢွၵ်ႇတီႈေႁႃၶမ်း Versailles မိူဝ်းၶိုၼ်းဝဵင်းပႄးရိသ်ႉ(Paris) မိူဝ်ႈ 6th October 1789။
ref_text: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.

src_text: ၽဵၼ်ႈၽဵၼ်ႈၼႆ ၵူၼ်းၸၢဝ်းတီႉပႅတ်ႉထ် ဢၼ်ၵိူဝ်းယမ်ပုတ်ႉၼႆႉ ၶဝ်ႈသိုဝ်ႈယူဝ်းတေႉ။  တီႈၼႂ်းၼၼ်ႉ ၶဝ်ႈပႃးဝႆႉ ၵၢၼ်ႁဵတ်းလွင်ႈယိုတ်ႈတူဝ်ၶိင်း (Kundalini Yoga) ၊ ၵၢၼ်ၼင်ႈတြႃး လႄႈ လၢႆးတၢင်း ၽႄႈတိူၼ်းလွင်ႁၵ်ႉႁွမ်ပႅင်း (all-embracing love) ၼႆယူႇယဝ်ႉ။

src_text: ၸွမ်းလၢႆးယေႃးၵ(yoga) Kundalilni သေ  ဢဵၼ်ႁႅင်း Kundalini (ႁႅင်းႁူႉႁၼ်လႆႈသေပိူင်ပိူင်) ၼႆႉ တိုၼ်ႇတူဝ်မႃးလူၺ်ႈ လၢႆးၽိုၵ်းၼင်ႈယေႃးၵ (yoga)၊ ၵၢၼ်ၽိုၵ်းလူမ်းထူၺ်ႈၸႂ်၊ လွတ်ႈဝၼ်းပရိၵ်ႈ လႄႈ လွင်ႈမုင်ႈႁၼ်ပိူင်ပဵၼ် ၸိူဝ်းၼႆႉယဝ်ႉ။
ref_text: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.
hyp_text: The practice of Kundalini yoga, which is a type of yoga that awakens the energy of Kundalini (the energy that is known and seen clearly), brings us to the path of spiritual practice, yoga, and meditation, frees us from the cycle of suffering and ignorance, and leads us to the path of enlightenment and wisdom.

src_text: Deity Yoga ၼႆႉပဵၼ်သုၼ်ၵၢင်ၶွင်ၵၢၼ်ၼင်ႈသမႃႇထိၶွင်ၵူၼ်းၶိူဝ်းထိပဵတ်ႇၶဝ်။ ပဵၼ်လွၵ်းလၢႆးဢၼ်ဢဝ်ၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈၶွင်ၽြႃးလၢႆလၢႆၸဝ်ႈမႃးလေႃးၵၼ် သေပဵၼ်ဢွၵ်ႇမႃးသဵၼ်ႈတၢင်းတႃႇႁဵတ်းႁႂ်ႈဢဵၼ်ႁႅင်းၼႂ်းတူဝ်ၶိင်းမူတ်းသႂ်မႃး၊  ဢဵၼ်ႁႅင်းတူဝ်ၸႂ် (chakra) လႄႈၺၢၼ်ႇလွင်ႈႁူႉႁၼ်ဢၼ်ၾၢင်ႉမႅၼ်ႈၼၼ်ႉၵေႃႈတေပေႃႇပဵၼ်မႃး။
ref_text: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
hyp_text: Deity Yoga is the path of spiritual practice that brings about the realization of the true nature of oneself, which is the union of the divine and the human. It is a method that uses the power of the Buddha's enlightenment to bring about the awakening of one's own awareness, and to develop the wisdom that sees the true nature of all phenomena. It is a practice that cultivates the wisdom that understands the emptiness of all phenomena, and brings about the realization of the true nature of the self, which is the unity of the body, speech, and mind. Through this practice, one can attain the state of Buddhahood, and develop the wisdom that sees the true nature of all phenomena, and brings about the liberation from the cycle of suffering.

src_text: ပိူင်တႅၵ်ႈမၼ်း၊ ပီၼိုင်ႈလႄႈပီၼိုင်ႈ လုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶွင်ႁူင်းႁဵၼ်း ‘Bennet School’ ၼႂ်းမိူင်းၶႄႊလိၾေႃႊၼီႊယႃႊပွတ်းႁွင်ႇ (North Carolina) ၶဝ်ၼၼ်ႉ လႆႈႁဵတ်းဢွၵ်ႇ ဝဵပ်ႉသၢႆႉ (website) ၼိုင်ႈဢၼ် ၵဵဝ်ႇလူၺ်ႈၵၢၼ်ဢွၵ်ႇလႄႇလဵပ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶွင်ၶဝ်တီႈဝဵင်းလူင်ၶွင်ၸိုင်ႈမိူင်း (State Capital) ၊ ပီၼိုင်ႈလႄႈပီၼိုင်ႈၼၼ်ႉ ၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈဝဵပ်ႉသၢႆႉၶဝ်တေလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈသေႇသေႇ၊ ၵူၺ်းၵႃႈ ၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈဝဵပ်ႉဢၼ်ၵဝ်ႇၶဝ်ၵေႃႈၵဵပ်းဝႆႉယူႇၼိူဝ်ဢွၼ်ႊလၢႆႊ တႃႇၸႂ်ႉပဵၼ်ပပ်ႉၵဵပ်းႁွမ်ၶေႃႈမုၼ်းလႄႈၶႅပ်းႁၢင်ႈ။

src_text: လွင်ႈတႅမ်ႈပလွၵ်ႉ (Blogs)ၸၢင်ႈၸွႆႈထႅမ်ပၼ်ပႃး လွင်ႈတႅမ်ႈလိၵ်ႈလုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶဝ်တိူဝ်းတွၼ်းၶိုၼ်ႈယႂ်ႇမႃးယူႇယဝ်ႉ။ မိူဝ်ႈၽွင်းလုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶဝ် တႄႇတႅမ်ႈတူဝ်ထူပ်း blog ၶဝ်လူၺ်ႈလွင်ႈပိူင်တႅမ်ႈလိၵ်ႈၽိတ်း လႄႈလွင်ႈလေႃးတူဝ်လိၵ်ႈၽိတ်းယူႇၼၼ်ႉ ၵူၼ်းပၼ်ႁႅင်းတူၺ်း(ပရိတ်ႈသၢတ်ႈ)ၵေႃႉၼိူင်ႈယင်းလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈမူၼ်ႉမႄးပၼ်လွင်ႈၸိူဝ်းၼၼ်ႉတၢင်းၼမ်ယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
ref_text: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.

src_text: လွင်ႈတႅမ်ႈပလွၵ်ႉ (Blogging)ၼႆႉ ပဵၼ်ၶိူင်ႈၵႅမ်မိူဝ်းဢၼ်တိုၵ်းသူၼ်းပၼ်လွင်ႈၵၢၼ်ႁဵတ်းႁူမ်ႈၵၼ် လႄႈ ၵမ်ႉထႅမ်ပၼ်လုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶဝ်တႃႇသိုပ်ႇလွင်ႈလဵပ်ႈႁဵၼ်းလီလီ ဝၢႆးသေပူၼ်ႉဝၼ်းပၢင်ပွႆးၾိင်ႈထုင်းႁူင်းႁဵၼ်းၼၼ်ႉၼေယဝ်ႉ။
ref_text: Blogging is a tool that inspires collaboration, and encourages students to extend learning well beyond the traditional school day.
hyp_text: Blogging is a platform that supports collaborative work and provides an opportunity for students to continue their studies, learn from each other, and share knowledge in a fun and interactive way, especially during school holidays and cultural festivals.

src_text: လွင်ႈၸႂ်ႉတိုဝ်း ပလွၵ်ႉ ဢၼ်ထုၵ်ႇမႅၼ်ႈၼၼ်ႉ "ၸၢင်ႈပၼ်သုၼ်ႇႁႂ်ႈလုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶဝ် မီးလွင်ႈမေႃၸၵ်းယွႆႈထတ်းတူၺ်းလီလီ လႄႈ မေႃထတ်းသၢင်ႈတႅပ်းတတ်းလီလိူဝ်တိူဝ်းမႃး၊ လုၵ်ႉတီႈလွင်ႈတူင်ႉတွပ်ႇလႅတ်းလႅတ်းသႅဝ်းသႅဝ်း ၼိူဝ်ၶေႃႈမုၼ်းဢိၼ်ႊတိူဝ်ႊၼဵတ်ႇၼၼ်ႉသေ လုၵ်ႈႁဵၼ်းၶဝ် တေၸၢင်ႈၼႄၸႅင်ႈၸၼ်ႉထၢၼ်ႈၶဝ် တီႈၼႂ်းၶေႃႈၵႂၢမ်းၵွင်ႉၵၢႆႇၼႂ်းလမ်းလိၵ်ႈၶွင်ၵူၼ်းတၢင်ႇၵေႃႉ လႄႈ တေၸၢင်ႈၸၼ်ၼႄပိူင်လိူင်း တၢင်းႁၼ်ထိုင်ၽၢႆႇၶဝ် ၼိူဝ်ၶေႃႈလမ်ႇလွင်ႈပၼ်ႁႃသေပိူင်ပိူင်ၼၼ်ႉပႃး ယူႇယဝ်ႉ (Oravec, 2002)။
ref_text: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).
hyp_text: The use of technology enables students to have access to a wide range of learning resources and to develop their critical thinking and problem-solving skills, as well as to enhance their learning outcomes. From the perspective of the learners, they will be able to demonstrate their understanding and skills in a more effective way through the use of technology. Moreover, technology allows learners to access a vast amount of information and to explore new knowledge and ideas, and to develop their critical thinking and analytical skills. Furthermore, technology provides learners with the opportunity to interact with others and to develop their communication and collaboration skills. Therefore, the use of technology in education is essential for the 21st century and it is necessary to integrate technology into the curriculum in order to prepare learners for the challenges of the future. (Oravec, 2002)

src_text: ဝဵင်း Ottawa ၼႆႉ ပဵၼ်ဝဵင်းလူင်ၶွင်မိူင်းၶႄႊၼႃႊတႃႇ (Canada) ဢၼ်မီးတၢင်းႁၢင်ႈလီ၊ မီးၵၢၼ်ၸႂ်ႉတိုဝ်းၽႃႇသႃႇၵႂၢမ်းလၢတ်ႈသွင်မဵဝ်း၊ လႄႈ မီးဝႆႉႁွင်ႈၼႄၶႅပ်းႁၢင်ႈပၢႆးမွၼ်း ဢိၵ်ႇပႃး ႁွင်ႈၼႄပိုၼ်း ဢၼ်ၼႄဝႆႉသိူၵ်ႈပိုၼ်း မိူဝ်ႈပူၼ်ႉမႃးလႄႈၵၢပ်ႈပၢၼ်ယၢမ်းလဵဝ်ၶွင်မိူင်းၶႄႊၼႃႊတႃႇ (Canada) ပေႃးၶပ်ႉယႆၵၼ်လူင်ဝႆႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
ref_text: Ottawa is Canada's charming, bilingual capital and features an array of art galleries and museums that showcase Canada's past and present.

src_text: မိူဝ်ႈလဵဝ်ႁႃသိုဝ်ႉလႆႈ ပေႃးၸွတ်ႇတူဝ်ႈ တင်းၵုၼ်ၶွၼ်ႈ(archipelago)သေ ၽၵ်းတၢင်းၵိၼ်ၵူၼ်းၶိူဝ်းၵျႃႇဝႃး(Javanese)ၼၼ်ႉ ႁဵတ်းဢွၵ်ႇၼႄၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈ ဝၢၼ်ႇၽၵ်းယူဝ်းယူဝ်း ၸိူဝ်းဢၼ်သ်ႂႇဝႆႉ ႁ်ႂႈလႆႈဢၢႆႁွမ်သေ ၶပ်ႉၸႅၼ်ႇၼႄဝႆႉၼၼ်ႉ၊ ဢၼ်ၵူၼ်းၶိူဝ်းၵျႃႇဝႃးၸ်ႂႉတိုဝ်းတင်းၼမ် တႃႇႁ်ႂႈၽၵ်းဝၢၼ်လီတႄႉပဵၼ် ထူဝ်ႇလိၼ်၊ မၢၵ်ႇၽိတ်ႉ၊ ၵိူဝ်ဝၢၼ် (ပိူင်လူင်တႄႉ ၵိူဝ်ဝၢၼ်မၢၵ်ႇဢုၼ်ၵျႃႇဝႃး) လႄႈ မီႇၵီးဢၼ်ႁွမ် ၵူႈမဵဝ်းမဵဝ်းၸိူဝ်းၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
ref_text: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
hyp_text: Nowadays, if we look at the archipelago and the Javanese people's eating habits, we can see that they have a diverse and rich food culture. The Javanese people have a long history of culinary arts, with a variety of dishes that are famous for their delicious flavors and aromas. For example, there are traditional dishes like gudeg, bakpia, and es teler, which are popular not only in Java but also throughout Indonesia. Moreover, there are many other dishes that are unique to the Javanese people, with their own specialties and flavors. Overall, the Javanese people have a rich and diverse food culture that is worth exploring and appreciating.
